screeningSummary: Trucker with dashcam footage of triangular object pacing his truck for two miles
arcNotes: Trucker with dashcam evidence, skeptical but has specific details, willing to defend his experience

lines.text: You're on the air. What's your story?
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. What's your story?

lines.text: Alright, you're on. What's this about?
lines.voiceText: Alright, you're on. What's this about?

lines.text: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Finally, someone with a good story - tell us everything!
lines.voiceText: YOU ARE ON THE AIR! Finally, someone with a good story - tell us everything!

lines.text: You're on. Look, I've heard a lot of stories tonight - why should I believe yours?
lines.voiceText: You're on. Look, I've heard a lot of stories tonight - why should I believe yours?

lines.text: You're on. So what'd you see?
lines.voiceText: You're on. So what'd you see?

lines.text: Oh good, a caller! What've you got for us tonight?
lines.voiceText: Oh good, a caller! What've you got for us tonight?

lines.text: You're on the air. Start with the basic facts.
lines.voiceText: You're on the air. Start with the basic facts.

lines.text: Twenty-two years driving trucks, Vern. Last night, I'm on Route 9 past the county line, maybe two hours into my shift, and I see this light. Not a plane. Not a drone. Just... hovering. Pacing my truck.
lines.voiceText: Twenty-two years driving trucks, Vern. Last night, I'm on Route 9 past the county line, maybe two hours into my shift, and I see this light. Not a plane. Not a drone. Just... hovering. Pacing my truck.

lines.text: Pacing your truck. How long did this go on?
lines.voiceText: Pacing your truck. How long did this go on?

lines.text: Pacing your truck... okay, how long?
lines.voiceText: Pacing your truck... okay, how long?

lines.text: Pacing your TRUCK?! That's incredible! How long did this go on?!
lines.voiceText: Pacing your TRUCK?! That's incredible! How long did this go on?!

lines.text: Pacing your truck. Of course it was. How long?
lines.voiceText: Pacing your truck. Of course it was. How long?

lines.text: Pacing your truck. Fine, I'll hear you out. How long?
lines.voiceText: Pacing your truck. Fine, I'll hear you out. How long?

lines.text: Pacing your truck! That's amazing! How long did it keep that up?
lines.voiceText: Pacing your truck! That's amazing! How long did it keep that up?

lines.text: Pacing your truck at highway speed. What was the duration?
lines.voiceText: Pacing your truck at highway speed. What was the duration?

lines.text: Two miles, Vern. Two miles at my exact speed. I'm doing fifty-five, this thing is doing fifty-five. Triangular, three lights at each point, dead silent. I know aircraft. I see them every night on these highways. This wasn't anything I've ever seen.
lines.voiceText: Two miles, Vern. Two miles at my exact speed. I'm doing fifty-five, this thing is doing fifty-five. Triangular, three lights at each point, dead silent. I know aircraft. I see them every night on these highways. This wasn't anything I've ever seen.

lines.text: Two miles at your speed. What happened after that?
lines.voiceText: Two miles at your speed. What happened after that?

lines.text: Two miles... alright. And then?
lines.voiceText: Two miles... alright. And then?

lines.text: TWO MILES?! That's unreal! What happened next?!
lines.voiceText: TWO MILES?! That's unreal! What happened next?!

lines.text: Two miles at fifty-five miles an hour. Let me guess - it vanished?
lines.voiceText: Two miles at fifty-five miles an hour. Let me guess - it vanished?

lines.text: Two miles. That's not nothing. What'd it do?
lines.voiceText: Two miles. That's not nothing. What'd it do?

lines.text: TWO MILES of pacing! This is incredible! What happened at the end?!
lines.voiceText: TWO MILES of pacing! This is incredible! What happened at the end?!

lines.text: Two miles matching your speed, triangular configuration. What was the behavior at the conclusion of this encounter?
lines.voiceText: Two miles matching your speed, triangular configuration. What was the behavior at the conclusion of this encounter?

lines.text: It just... accelerated. Straight up. Gone in two seconds. I watched it on my dash cam when I stopped. Clear as day. I've been staring at that footage for six hours now, trying to figure out what I'm looking at.
lines.voiceText: It just... accelerated. Straight up. Gone in two seconds. I watched it on my dash cam when I stopped. Clear as day. I've been staring at that footage for six hours now, trying to figure out what I'm looking at.

lines.text: I've got to ask - could this be military testing? There's a lot of black projects out there.
lines.voiceText: I've got to ask - could this be military testing? There's a lot of black projects out there.

lines.text: Look, it could be military stuff, you know how it is out there...
lines.voiceText: Look, it could be military stuff, you know how it is out there...

lines.text: STRAIGHT UP?! Gone in TWO SECONDS?! This is AMAZING! Military tech, maybe?
lines.voiceText: STRAIGHT UP?! Gone in TWO SECONDS?! This is AMAZING! Military tech, maybe?

lines.text: Of course it accelerated straight up. You know, there's military training out there...
lines.voiceText: Of course it accelerated straight up. You know, there's military training out there...

lines.text: Could be military tests. That's my guess anyway. What's your take?
lines.voiceText: Could be military tests. That's my guess anyway. What's your take?

lines.text: Straight up into the sky! Gone in two seconds! This is PERFECT! Military, you think?
lines.voiceText: Straight up into the sky! Gone in two seconds! This is PERFECT! Military, you think?

lines.text: Vertical acceleration to escape velocity. What are your thoughts on potential origin - military, experimental aircraft, or something else?
lines.voiceText: Vertical acceleration to escape velocity. What are your thoughts on potential origin - military, experimental aircraft, or something else?

lines.text: I thought the same thing, okay? I've been running through every explanation. But Vern, I've been driving these routes for twenty-two years. I know what military aircraft looks like. This broke every expectation I had about what aircraft can do.
lines.voiceText: I thought the same thing, okay? I've been running through every explanation. But Vern, I've been driving these routes for twenty-two years. I know what military aircraft looks like. This broke every expectation I had about what aircraft can do.

lines.text: Send that footage in. Our team will tear it apart and if it's real, you're going to be part of something big. Appreciate you calling in.
lines.voiceText: Send that footage in. Our team will tear it apart and if it's real, you're going to be part of something big. Appreciate you calling in.

lines.text: Yeah, send the footage in. Someone should look at it. Thanks for calling.
lines.voiceText: Yeah, send the footage in. Someone should look at it. Thanks for calling.

lines.text: Send us that footage! Our team is going to FREAK OUT over this! You're part of something HUGE!
lines.voiceText: Send us that footage! Our team is going to FREAK OUT over this! You're part of something HUGE!

lines.text: Right, well... send the footage in if you want. We'll take a look. Next caller.
lines.voiceText: Right, well... send the footage in if you want. We'll take a look. Next caller.

lines.text: Send the footage in. We'll check it out. Thanks for calling.
lines.voiceText: Send the footage in. We'll check it out. Thanks for calling.

lines.text: Send us that DASH CAM FOOTAGE! This is exactly why we do this show! You're amazing!
lines.voiceText: Send us that DASH CAM FOOTAGE! This is exactly why we do this show! You're amazing!

lines.text: Please send that footage to our research team. We will analyze every frame for anomalies, propulsion signatures, and corroborating evidence. Thank you for coming forward.
lines.voiceText: Please send that footage to our research team. We will analyze every frame for anomalies, propulsion signatures, and corroborating evidence. Thank you for coming forward.

lines.text: Will do, Vern. Thanks for... thanks for not laughing. It means a lot.
lines.voiceText: Will do, Vern. Thanks for... thanks for not laughing. It means a lot.
